content: CFS-MSL GPP Pre-drywall Gangplate Stud-mounted gangplates for installing modular fire sleeves before drywall ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - - ### FEATURES:Features Modular design for easy customization – you can combine fire-rated sleeves in different sizes within one frame Can be stacked vertically between studs Applications Available for both 16 and 24 on center stud applications The 16x4 has an usable installation device space of 12x4 The 24x4 has an usable device installation space of 21x4 Stud-mounted before drywall installation CFS-MSL GCL Clamps are required for ganging ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Temperature resistance range: -22 - 167 °F Technical Data | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2341229 - Pre-install gang plate CFS-MSL GPP 16x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2341230 - Pre-install gang plate CFS-MSL GPP 24x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 3805996 - Pre-install gang plate 16x4 & 2xLarge device + 1Ganging clamps - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-MSL GPP 16x4 Pre-install gang plate - 2x CFS-MSL L 6x4 Firestop sleeve - 12x CFS-MSL GCL (12) Ganging clip
tag_description: Stud-mounted gangplates for installing modular fire sleeves before drywall
